JobFullDesc:
Okta Recruiting is re-imagining how recruiting is done. We are on a journey to becoming a pro-active talent sales and marketing organization. The product we are focused on marketing to our customers, talented candidates, is a career at Okta! Our vision, why we exist, is “Connect the Best Talent with Okta.  Everywhere.” How do we do this?  The recruiting team, and the partners we enable, identify and acquire the world’s best talent via the Okta Talent Ecosystem. Once identified, we create engaging experiences for the talent we want to hire today (qualified and ready-now), while nurturing relationships with the talent we want to hire tomorrow (qualified and ready-later). We are investing in creating the best customer experiences, building a marketing team, a tech stack inclusive of automation tools and finding, growing and developing the best recruiting talent to join our team.  
THE ROLE:
This role will primarily focus on full-cycle recruitment for our G&A Teams (Legal, People, Finance and Accounting) with the ability to flex into other GTM areas as needed. There will be a focus on helping to create great experiences for candidates and our internal business partners alike. We look for our Recruiters to be trusted advisors to our hiring managers, source and deliver top customer facing talent and have an “always recruiting” mindset.
To be successful in this role, you must be able to keep pace in a highly fluid, ever-changing, collaborative workplace. You must also have excellent communication skills in order to engage the attention of our experienced leadership team and influence/respond to complexities with a high level of technical acumen. We are disrupting a multi-billion dollar industry – are you ready to join us?
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

Serve as a strategic hiring expert & business partner to our Legal, People, Finance and Accounting Teams
Advise hiring partners on strategies to address talent gaps and future talent needs, through hiring
Help determine roles, scopes and draft dynamic job descriptions for your teams given organizational objectives
Serve as a subject matter expert for hiring across multiple markets and timezones while driving talent strategies that build a diverse workforce & promote a culture of inclusion
When needed, challenge assumptions & influence hiring stakeholders to so ensure an objective process is completed, and the best hire is made for the organization
Develop & leverage metrics to inform recruiting decisions, but not take that data alone at face value to determine actions

QUALIFICATIONS:

5+ plus years of experience in full cycle recruiting. The ideal candidates will have recruited for Legal, People/HR and/or Finance and Accounting departments
Pro-active mind-set in that we are not taking orders, rather leading a process in partnership with hiring managers engage in their part to win top talent
Comfortable with ambiguity; can create order out of uncertainty
Demonstrated excellence and passion for candidate experience at each step of the recruitment process
Experience with and appreciation for proactive candidate cultivation/relationship building with top-tier passive candidates over time
Marketing mind-set; ability to deliver top of the funnel outside of traditional methods such as postings or sending In-Mails
Drives for results; demonstrated track record meeting or exceeding quarterly and annual hiring targets
Focus on candidate experience, hiring manager experience and key recruiting funnel metrics that when met, lead to success
BS/BA degree preferred
